abstract: According to a German newspaper, Mr. Lieb was dismissed on Monday after being warned repeatedly to not wield corporate cash and influence for personal use.
snippet: According to a German newspaper, Mr. Lieb was dismissed on Monday after being warned repeatedly to not wield corporate cash and influence for personal use.

headline.main: Ernst Lieb, Former Mercedes-Benz USA C.E.O., Was Reportedly Fired for Misuse of Funds
